tweet: Heading to the White House this morning—wearing my priorities on my socks—to discuss the need for a 21st century infrastructure bill that will repair our crumbling roads and bridges, create good-paying jobs, and invest in green technologies. pic.twitter.com/8bbHAjhj8B

I'm pleased to see that a federal judge in Oregon ruled against the Trump administration and sided with the state of Oregon for protecting Title X family planning funding: https://www.oregonlive.com/news/2019/04/federal-judge-in-oregon-to-grant-preliminary-injunction-against-trumps-title-x-rules-restricting-abortion-access.html …

Thank you to the @USCG crew at Newport Air Station for the incredible rescue of an 83-year old man earlier this week. The Newport Air Station is a vital resource for our coastal communities and I will continue to fight any efforts to close it down. https://content.govdelivery.com/accounts/USDHSCG/bulletins/24058f2 …

Thanks to @LWVLaneCo for the opportunity to speak on the need to protect the #ACA, expand access to healthcare, and reduce Rx drug costs. Far too many Oregonians are facing skyrocketing costs, and something needs to change. https://youtu.be/lNAU5pZYKZY

Yesterday, Social Security trustees reported the program will not be able to pay full benefits starting in 2035. My legislation ensures the nation’s wealthiest pay their fair share into the program and guarantees solvency for decades to come. https://www.rollcall.com/news/congress/social-security-finances-political-blessing-policy-curse …

Thanks to @city_eugene for the opportunity to speak to your members last week about our nation's crumbling infrastructure and the need for a comprehensive, 21st-century transportation bill. Even in the Oregon spring rain, it was a thrill to see construction underway at @swocc’s Science & Tech Building. Women are losing $900 billion every year because of paycheck discrimination.  Imagine how different our economy would look if everyone earned a fair wage! Same job, same pay—it’s as simple as that. #EqualPayDay
